subject: How to add my output to junitreport?
msgSnippet: Hello: I want to add my output messages to result of test in junitreport. For example ,I use System.out.println() to print output to screen now, but I want to
messageBody:
Hello:
I want to add my output messages to result of test in junitreport.
For example ,I use System.out.println() to print output to screen now,
but I want to add these message to html page in junitreport too.

How to do?
Thank you very much.
